Entry.JapaneseText: この街は比較的、<Blue>思念<White>の影響を受けていない 感じがする……あの聖殿の影響だろうか。
Entry.EnglishText: This town seems to be relatively unaffected by the <Blue>Will<White>... Perhaps that is due to the Holy Temple's influence.

Entry.JapaneseText: 意味なく聖殿と呼ばれているわけではないだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think they call it that without reason.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何らかの<Blue>思念<White>を弱める要素が あるような気がするんだが……
Entry.EnglishText: I feel as though there is some factor that is mitigating the <Blue>Will<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: それでも、<Blue>思念<White>の影響を 受けてる人はいるヨ？
Entry.EnglishText: But in spite of that, there are still people here being affected by it?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……それほどにこの<Blue>思念<White>というのは 強力なものなのか……
